verses.text: A \w soft|strong="H7390"\w* \w answer|strong="H4617"\w* \w turneth|strong="H7725"\w* away \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*: but \w grievous|strong="H6089"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* stir \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.

The \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* useth \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w aright|strong="H3190"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* poureth \w out|strong="H5042"\w* \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w*.\f + \fr 15.2 \ft poureth: Heb. belcheth, or, bubbleth\f*

The \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add are\add* in every \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w beholding|strong="H6822"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* and the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

A \w wholesome|strong="H4832"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add is\add* a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: but \w perverseness|strong="H5558"\w* therein \add is\add* a \w breach|strong="H7667"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.\f + \fr 15.4 \ft A wholesome…: Heb. The healing of the tongue\f*

A \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* \w despiseth|strong="H5006"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*: but he that \w regardeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* is \w prudent|strong="H6191"\w*.

In the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w treasure|strong="H2633"\w*: but in the \w revenues|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* is \w trouble|strong="H5916"\w*.

The \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: but the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* \add doeth\add* not so.

The \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \add is\add* his \w delight|strong="H7522"\w*.

The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but he \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* him that \w followeth|strong="H7291"\w* after \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w Correction|strong="H4148"\w* \add is\add* \w grievous|strong="H7451"\w* unto him that \w forsaketh|strong="H5800"\w* the \w way|strong="H0734"\w*: \add and\add* he that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 15.10 \ft Correction: or, Instruction\f*

\w Hell|strong="H7585"\w* and \w destruction|strong="H0011"\w* \add are\add* before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: how much more then the \w hearts|strong="H3826"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*?
A \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* not one that \w reproveth|strong="H3198"\w* him: neither will he \w go|strong="H3212"\w* unto the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*.

A \w merry|strong="H8056"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* maketh a \w cheerful|strong="H3190"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*: but by \w sorrow|strong="H6094"\w* of the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* is \w broken|strong="H5218"\w*.

The \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of him that hath \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w feedeth|strong="H7462"\w* on \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w*.

All the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \add are\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: but he that is of a \w merry|strong="H2896"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add hath\add* a \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w*.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* with the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* than \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w* and \w trouble|strong="H4103"\w* therewith.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* a \w dinner|strong="H0737"\w* of \w herbs|strong="H3419"\w* where \w love|strong="H0160"\w* is, than a \w stalled|strong="H0075"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* and \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w* therewith.

A \w wrathful|strong="H2534"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* stirreth \w up|strong="H1624"\w* \w strife|strong="H4066"\w*: but \add he that is\add* \w slow|strong="H0750"\w* to \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \w appeaseth|strong="H8252"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*.

The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w slothful|strong="H6102"\w* \add man is\add* as an \w hedge|strong="H4881"\w* of \w thorns|strong="H2312"\w*: but the \w way|strong="H0734"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* \add is\add* made \w plain|strong="H5549"\w*.\f + \fr 15.19 \ft is made…: Heb. is raised up as a causey\f*

A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* maketh a \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: but a \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w despiseth|strong="H0959"\w* his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

\w Folly|strong="H0200"\w* \add is\add* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* to \add him that is\add* \w destitute|strong="H2638"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H3820"\w*: but a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* \w walketh|strong="H3212"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H3474"\w*.\f + \fr 15.21 \ft destitute…: Heb. void of heart\f*

Without \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w* \w purposes|strong="H4284"\w* are \w disappointed|strong="H6565"\w*: but in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* they are \w established|strong="H6965"\w*.

A \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* by the \w answer|strong="H4617"\w* of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: and a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \add spoken\add* in due \w season|strong="H6256"\w*, how \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add is it\add*!\f + \fr 15.23 \ft due…: Heb. his season\f*

The \w way|strong="H0734"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \add is\add* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* to the \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*, that he may \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w destroy|strong="H5255"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w proud|strong="H1343"\w*: but he will \w establish|strong="H5324"\w* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*.

The \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \add are\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but \add the words\add* of the \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \add are\add* \w pleasant|strong="H5278"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*.\f + \fr 15.26 \ft pleasant…: Heb. words of pleasantness\f*

He that is \w greedy|strong="H1214"\w* of \w gain|strong="H1215"\w* \w troubleth|strong="H5916"\w* his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; but he that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

The \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w studieth|strong="H1897"\w* to \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w poureth|strong="H5042"\w* out evil \w things|strong="H7451"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* from the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: but he \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

The \w light|strong="H3974"\w* of the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H8055"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \add and\add* a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w report|strong="H8052"\w* \w maketh|strong="H1878"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w fat|strong="H1878"\w*.

The \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* the \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w abideth|strong="H3885"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*.

He that \w refuseth|strong="H6544"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \w despiseth|strong="H3988"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: but he that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* \w getteth|strong="H7069"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 15.32 \ft instruction: or, correction\f*\f + \fr 15.32 \ft heareth: or, obeyeth\f*\f + \fr 15.32 \ft getteth…: Heb. possesseth an heart\f*

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* the \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*; and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* \add is\add* \w humility|strong="H6038"\w*.
